metadata.title: CVE-2024-22034 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Attackers could put the special files in .osc into the actual packagesources (e.g. _apiurl). This allows the attacker to change theconfiguration of osc for the victim

criterions.comment: osc package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
